data.text: @harry_and_meg @SammyMarkle64 @Markstrunk13 She should be held accountable for her actions. I feel so sorry for her children. I can’t imagine how her father could side with her against the Duchess.

@harry_and_meg @SammyMarkle64 @Markstrunk13 Her abuse of the Duchess is just ingrained in her DNA. She is a known perpetrator of violence against her own children for years. Losing each one of the to child protection sevice. The Media that gives her a voice normalizes this behaviour.
